short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean, automatic light/dark theme for Roam.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This theme automatically applied light/dark styling based on your default system theme. It removes distracting elements, and improves the overall usage of Roam Research.
